channel.title: visual studio on Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in visual studio on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: Logic Apps improvement suggestions
item.description: I must say that Logic Apps has come a long way in its brief lifetime. It’s surprisingly easy to get up and go with Logic Apps and the number of available connectors is crazy. However there are still a couple of things that could be improved to make it friendlier for the more serious applications. Here’s my list. The last few weeks I had the chance to spend a lot of time with Azure Logic Apps.

item.title: Lightswitch: custom ribbon button
item.description: Two weeks ago, on July 26th, Visual Studio Lightswitch 2011 was released. I ‘d seen a couple of videos what you can do with Lightswitch so I though I’d put it to the test by developing a replacement for a tool I use at one of my clients. Lightswitch is really easy to use and I believe I can actually teach my wife to create data-centric application using it. Until you reach the limits though, because than it becomes more difficult really fast.
